roleset.name: intentional climber
roleset.note: CLIMB-V NOTES: Roleset based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'rise.' True: 'clamber' is the same verb as 'climb' (from climb.01-v) CLIMB-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry climb.01, OntoNotes grouping climb-n senses 2& 3; maps to VerbNet classes escape-51.1-1-3 & run-51.3.2. Framed by Claire. (from climb.01-n) CLIMBING-N NOTES: climb.01 (from climbing.01-n)

roleset.name: non-intentional climber; cf rise

role.descr: attribute, when attribute of item is climbing rather than the whole

roleset.note: CLIMB-V NOTES: (from climb.02-v) CLIMB-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry climb.02, OntoNotes grouping climb-n sense 4; maps to VN classes calibratable_cos-45.6-1& meander-47.7-1. Framed by Claire. (from climb.02-n) CLIMBING-N NOTES: climb.02 (from climbing.02-n)
